mil3.5.1:1.7: “Kim pana, maharaja, himavati uha nadi taya dittha”ti?
mil3.5.1:1.12: “Atthi, bhante, kincapi maya uha nadi na dittha, pitarapi me uha nadi na dittha, api ca atthi uha nadi”ti.
mil3.5.1:1.13: “Evameva kho, maharaja, kincapi maya bhagava na dittho, acariyehipi me bhagava na dittho, api ca atthi bhagava”ti.
